text: Yes correct <@UHDEVB0S1>, If you use JS in specific JS tab and its  Realtime content update then page refresh is required for a event listener or you can modify JS accordingly to always look for elements

You can't alter files for free or paid themes from the marketplace.

The best option is to create a child theme to work from where you can overwrite specific modules, create new templates, etc.
<@U022YD6LGAU> - Thank you. We will adapt our JS to account for the event listeners for a much more fluent experience :partyparrot:
